Player History
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 4/3/1985 to a 1-year deal worth $1,060,000 per year...
Had first career hit on 4/4/1985, off Fernando Valenzuela (LAD)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/5/1985, off Bob Welch (LAD)...
2/2/1986: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,178,571 through salary arbitration...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
2/2/1987: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,328,571 through salary arbitration...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 2/26/1988 to a 3-year deal worth $3,120,535 per year...
Had 6 hits with 4 RBI against New York (Y) on 4/11/1988...
Injured on 4/18/1989 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 6/17/1989 with a Inflamed Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Detroit on 2/9/1991 to a 2-year deal worth $4,000,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/28/1991, hitting .519 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
